alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 10:38PM MDT until June 24 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Hamlin County in northeastern South Dakota... Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1138 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of South Shore to near Pelican Lake to near Lake Norden, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Castlewood and Waverly around 1145 PM CDT. South Shore, Kranzburg and Claremont Colony around 1150 PM CDT. Goodwin, Troy, Lake Poinsett and Stone Bridge around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Stockholm, Strandburg, Dempster, Clear Lake, Estelline, La Bolt, Altamont, Tunerville, Lake Alice, Revillo, Albee, Moritz, Gary and Lake Cochrane Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin
